reviewText: great introduction to a novice gun owner....very informative
Very informative videos to help teach new shooters proper techniques, i.e. Gripping, sighting, stances etc.  Also Good information for experienced shoots as well.
Like this video, not a high budget feature film, but a lot of great trading and technical info

For me this video was very helpful at pointing out some key errors I was making. After watching this video, I was able to apply a lot of the step by step instructions which improved my overall performance and point shooting (shooting without sights). This video allows you to learn what takes most people several weeks of training in only a few hours.
This is the most complete training dvd iv seen.  It is applicable for every shooter, weather a new or experienced shooter.  You also get a lot for your money, almost 5 hours on 3 disks!!!  5 STARS
By far the best video on the market, I've seen a few different videos before deciding to take my carry class. I wish I would have found this video a long time ago, it covers everything!!
